title: HSBC's Bowers on Opportunities in the High Yield Market (Audio)
itunes:title: HSBC's Bowers on Opportunities in the High Yield Market (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Mary Bowers, Senior Portfolio Manager at HSBC Global Asset Management (GAM), on why the 2016 high yield run is not likely to abate in the foreseeable future.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
